cgcloud__CP_Calculation_Schema_Determina.name: cgcloud__CP_Calculation_Schema_Determination__c
cgcloud__CP_Calculation_Schema_Determina.description: The calculation schema determination object is used to determine the rule based on order template pricing type and customer pricing type.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Account_Price_Type__c.description: Defines the pricing type of the customer.

cgcloud__Order_Price_Type__c.description: Defines the pricing type of the sales document template.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales organization to which the calculation schema determination record belongs.
